name: Mohammad Firas Sada
title: Researcher at San Diego Supercomputer Center - HPC - AI/ML - Networking - FPGAs - DevOps
shortTitle: Researcher at San Diego Supercomputer Center | HPC | AI/ML | Networking | FPGAs | DevOps
greeting: Hi, My name is Mohammad Firas Sada

about.description: Researcher at San Diego Supercomputer Center specializing in HPC, AI/ML, networking, and FPGA acceleration for high-performance systems.
details: I work on accelerating network infrastructure and AI workloads using FPGAs and specialized hardware. My research spans P4-programmable switches, distributed computing, and containerized HPC environments.
Previously developed ML predictive models at SAP. Passionate about building efficient, scalable systems at the intersection of hardware and software.
